items.sentence: Tom and I\'ve decided not to go to Boston for Christmas.
Tom might be able to do better if we gave him more time.
Tom might want to consider buying what he needs from us.
Why don\'t you go back to your hotel and get some sleep?
Tom thought what Mary asked him to do was way too risky.
Tom told Mary that she would have to do that by herself.
Let\'s not make any hasty decisions. Let\'s sleep on it.
This is the first time we\'ve given a concert in Boston.
Tom acknowledged that what he said earlier was not true.
Tom used to go to Boston every summer when he was a kid.
